sentences.english: They're weighed and fed automatically into mixers.
sentences.chinese: 用料稱好重量之後，被自動送入攪拌機中。

sentences.english: He became garrulous after a few glasses of wine.
sentences.chinese: 他幾杯酒下肚之後便嘮嘮叨叨說個沒完。

sentences.english: After that, people call on their relatives, friends and neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 在那之後，人們給親戚，朋友和鄰居拜年。

sentences.english: The slavery was overthrown after the Civil War in U.S.A.
sentences.chinese: 在南北戰爭結束之後，美國的奴隸制被廢除了。

sentences.english: One of the girls she rescued from a pimp later graduated from high school as valedictorian.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個她所救的女孩之後在高中畢業典禮上致辭。

sentences.english: When she came back, she did her summer exercise first.
sentences.chinese: 當她回到家中之後，她首先做了暑假作業。

sentences.english: After that, everybody pelted snowballs at anybody who was riding the sled.
sentences.chinese: 那之後，每個人都對著坐雪橇滑下來的人砸雪球。

sentences.english: After leaving the smell of land behind him, he set his lines.
sentences.chinese: 在把陸地的氣息拋在身後之後，他放下了釣絲。

sentences.english: Note that the standard requires an empty line after the headers too.
sentences.chinese: 注意該標準同樣要求在域頭之後要有個空行。

sentences.english: A man from China died after his three day gaming binge.
sentences.chinese: 一名中國男子在三天三夜的遊戲狂歡之後，死掉了。

sentences.english: They dishonored her so much that she turned from them in disgust.
sentences.chinese: 她受玷污之後，遂即厭棄了他們。

sentences.english: After a Fan (mould) is made, pour molten bronze into it.
sentences.chinese: 等做好了範之後再把銅液倒進去。

sentences.english: After making his tea, I asked if it would be all right if I visited him again .
sentences.chinese: 給他泡好茶之後，我問他以後是否可以再來拜訪。

sentences.english: She was caught trying to sneak into the bar and was booted out.
sentences.chinese: 她被發現偷溜進去該酒吧，之後被踢了出來。

sentences.english: There was a moment of silence, then everyone but the Princess began to laugh.
sentences.chinese: 片刻寂靜之後，皇族貴胄們鬨堂大笑，除了公主。

sentences.english: It rained yesterday after it had been dry for many months.
sentences.chinese: 在天旱了好幾個月之後，昨天下雨了。

definition: a moment ago/just now/(indicating sth happening later than expected)/(preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until/(followed by a numerical clause) only
as for/as to/to go so far as to
early or late/priority/in succession/one after another
to escape (danger)/to rescue/to come out alive
haven't/hasn't/doesn't exist/to not have/to not be
